description: Meta announced on Friday that it will start testing ads on its Threads platform with select brands in the US and Japan, as the app surpasses 300 million monthly active users. The company will closely monitor the tests before a wider rollout, allowing businesses to extend their existing Meta ad campaigns to Threads.
title: Meta to Begin Testing Ads on Threads in the US and Japan

description: Samsung Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra can finally install updates while the handsets running, thus reducing reboot time post-update. The South Korean firm has finally added support for seamless updates, a feature added by Google nearly eight years ago.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Adds Support for Google's Seamless Updates Feature

description: Airtel has revised its voice and SMS-only recharge plan prices following the introduction of new prepaid options, in line with TRAI's guidelines announced last month. The operator quietly updated the prices of both voice and SMS-only special tariff vouchers (STVs) soon after TRAI announced it would review the new vouchers. Airtel had previously updated its existing STVs with data allowance to include the new recharge vouchers.
title: Airtel Revises New Voice and SMS-Only Recharge Plans: Check Updated Prices

description: OpenAI is facing a copyright lawsuit from Indian and international book publishers in New Delhi, that aims to prevent the firm's ChatGPT chatbot from accessing proprietary content. The Federation of Indian Publishers stated it has lodged the case at the Delhi High Court, which is already handling a similar suit against OpenAI.
title: OpenAI Faces New Copyright Case, From Global Publishers in India

description: Apple's iPhone 17 series may not see notable changes to the Dynamic Island this year, according to TF Securities International analyst Ming-Chi Kuo. The latest claim contradicts earlier reports that suggested Apple would shrink the size of the Dynamic Island, which contains the selfie camera and other sensors for Face ID.
title: iPhone 17 Series to Arrive With 'Largely Unchanged' Dynamic Island: Ming-Chi Kuo

description: Xiaomi 15 Ultra design has been leaked by a tipster, via a hands-on image. The Xiaomi 15 Ultra is expected to launch soon as the successor to the Xiaomi 14 Ultra, and the upcoming flagship is expected to arrive with a large rear camera module that includes a quad rear camera setup.
title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra Design, Rear Camera Module Spotted via Leaked Live Image

description: Tata Electronics Pvt Ltd (TEPL) has acquired a 60 percent controlling stake in Pegatron's India unit. Pegatron India, a subsidiary of Taiwan's Pegatron Corporation, provides contract-based electronics manufacturing services (EMS) to major global companies such as Apple.
title: Tata Electronics Acquires 60 Percent Stake in iPhone Maker Pegatron Technology India
